description: Describes temperature, humidity, precipitation, and similar climate properties for a biome. Biomes without this component will use default values. Temperature affects visual effects like snow/ice placement, sponge drying, and sky color. Downfall controls precipitation frequency and intensity.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Biome Climate
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Describes temperature, humidity, precipitation, and similar. Biomes without this component will have default values.

fields.title: Downfall
fields.description: Amount that precipitation affects colors and block changes. Setting to 0 will stop rain from falling in the biome.

fields.title: Snow Accumulation
fields.description: Minimum and maximum snow level, each multiple of 0.125 is another snow layer

fields.title: Temperature
fields.description: Temperature affects a variety of visual and behavioral things, including snow and ice placement, sponge drying, and sky color
